posts.postText: Maybe I'm lost hear but I punched in the IP address for JB and its giving me a DRP server. is this right?
Yeah, Ben (I believe), sold the server and it is now being used by someone else. Jail isn't currently up yet.
Ah alright, makes some sense, just wasn't that the one we were told was the new one? which is why I am confused.
I get the [POF] server for jailbreak......ugh hate that server so much admin abuse.

>> I get the [POF] server for jailbreak......ugh hate that server so much admin abuse. 
I wouldn't even touch POF after my experience, the server lags like hell, the motions for some awful reason are really blocky to where i can't hit or shoot right, and that admin abuse or there lack of admin support. I guess I have to wait patiently for NNJG to bring back JB, and hopefully I'll be able to access the shop once again.
PoF has no script blocking from what I remember, go install faphack and the server becomes a lot more fun XD

>> PoF has no script blocking from what I remember, go install faphack and the server becomes a lot more fun XD 

I personally hate hacks (ps. probably gonna be derailed soon lulz). I don't even go near them, the only one I have used before is a kill tracker, and that was for shits and giggles.
